name: cms
title: CMS
description: Shoutem CMS extension provides the integration with the Shoutem CMS. Extensions using CMS extension are able to fetch data from CMS and use Shoutem CMS editor.
releaseNotes:
* Added "Hide timestamp" checkbox to Layout settings page, next to category picker type dropdown
* This hides the timestamp showing how long ago the CMS item was created or updated for extensions that support it
